content: these are two-toned toe-up ankle socks with a kitty chart on the toe and foot they feature a simple short-row heel they can be made with contrasting colors or two-of-a-kind this is my first foray into design and i had a lot of fun feel free to contact me with any issues 01/01/2017 edit i am so honored and humbled by the positive response to this pattern *i wanted to address the questions i have received regarding how the chart should be executed - for my version i knit the chart intarsia style but it can also be duplicate stitched or a mixture of the two eyes duplicated ears and nose intarsia it s totally up to you *
